Subsection (c) discussed. Moved that Plan 1 he
adopted with the understanding that the vote could
he reconsidered on the basis of the action taken on
the Associate member vote question. Seconded.
Carried.
Moved that subsection (d) of Part 1 he adopted as
read. Seconded. Carried.
Moved that Part 2, subsections (a) and (b) he adopted
as read. Seconded. Discussion. Motion amended to
adopt Part 2, subsection (a) only, as read. Seconded.
Carrle&.
Moved that Part 2, subsection (b) be amended to read
n$ach Associate Member shall he entitled to one vote
(except where the sponsoring Institution Is an Active
Member, such Associate Members shall not be entitled
to a vote)tto She amendment was discussed, seconded
and carried.
Moved that Part 2, subsection (b) a& amended be approved.
Discussion. Moved to table motion to approve Part 2,
subsection (b) as amended. Seconded. Carried.
Moved to postpone the consideration of constitutional
changes. Seconded. Carried.
Meeting adjourned,
